name: Rafael Frank
description: 8+ years of developing world class enterprise software. Extraordinary performer recognized by management and peers for skillset, leadership, positivity and getting the job done.

experiences.description: Integrated Business Suite that allows non-developers to design, run and monitor custom business processes.

activities.description: Applied infrastructure as code using Terraform to automate and improve landscape managemen, reducing the time to create new landscapes by 80%.
Setup the integrated multitenancy strategy reusing the framework provided by the platform across the suite and 4 underlying applications.
Defined and implemented the Kafka topic management strategy for the tenant aware services.

experiences.description: Lightweight and flexible project management tool with simple process modelling and execution features.

activities.description: Designed and developed features for both frontend and backend increasing team throughput.
Designed and implemented an end-to-end annotation-based OData API framework in NodeJS that increased developer productivity through automated pagination, filter and API generation.
Optimized SQL queries increasing overall API performance.
Developed the webhooks system allowing developers to configure and maintain integrations conveniently.

experiences.description: Online vectorial editor, focused on creating, maintaining and sharing marketing content on online social networks.

activities.description: Assembled and mobilized the initial team of co-founders to further develop the idea, roadmap and kick start the development of our startup.
Defined and implemented commercial model to cover our operational expenses.
Designed and developed the backend stack focusing on security, performance and scalability using NodeJS and Postgres.
Designed and developed many reusable components and a library facilitate the integration between the frontend and backend APIs.
Integrated the application with major social networks, allowing paying users to post content seamlessly.

experiences.description: Custom development team focused building new cloud applications and extending SAP cloud solutions.

activities.description: Selected to join a strategic sprint zero workshop in New Zealand as solution architect.
Selected to join two strategic projects in Germany as frontend developer.
Designed, developed and led teams to deliver 30+ custom extensions on a variety of SAP Cloud ERP modules
Worked closely with 20+ customers and product teams to design solutions and estimate project costs.
Part of SAP Catalyst program for outstanding performers.

awards.title: 14 Awards for Professionalism and Teamwork
awards.description: Awarded multiple times by peers for my performance in delivering value to our customers.

awards.title: First Place at UFRGS Entrepreneurship Marathon (Flimbo)
awards.description: Flimbo won as the most innovative and overall most mature startup on the event.

awards.title: Products and Innovation Talent Award
awards.description: Nominated one of the talents of the year among the worldwide organization.

initiatives.title: Blockchain Unit
initiatives.description: Led a blockchain studies group to identify potential applications in our customer projects.

initiatives.title: Team Calendar
initiatives.description: Built a planning tool to allow workload visualization and distribution on a team of 70+ employees.

initiatives.title: Dev Sync Meetings
initiatives.description: Recurring event that invited peers to discuss and present new technologies in a very informal and friendly way.

education.title: Software Analysis and Development
education.institution: Universidade do Vale do Rio dos Sinos
